attributes.additional_details: A lot of people prefer these flavours to cigarettes because the flavoured cigarettes aren’t strong enough flavours wise.
attributes.background: Keep disposable vapes because a decent amount of money is made from them being purchased and sold.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Don't implement a ban on disposable vapes:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643681
